#pragma once


#include <string>


class ThisReleaseInfo
{
private:
   static std::string version;
   static std::string allegro_flare_git_hash;

protected:


public:
   ThisReleaseInfo();
   ~ThisReleaseInfo();

   static std::string get_version();
   static std::string get_allegro_flare_git_hash();
};
